help:
- /namelist ~ to check who this player is - /blockpm ~ toggle PM functionality - /cradar ~ to open the settings panel and set for your own needs - /creport ~ to open a panel where you can write a report against players. ALL REPORTS WILL BE SENT TO OUR DISCORD # player-reports - F6 ~ by pressing F6 you can move to another server without going to the game menu - CW ~ the clanwar script has been connected to a discord bot and shows you all played clan wars in our discord
- Discord: https://discord.gg/rE4nNyWQBD
